Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

Q:

How do I play a track off a CD?

A:

To play a CD track, follow these steps:

1) Open the redbook device with AIL_redbook_open.

2) Get the start and stop points with AIL_redbook_track_info.

3) Call AIL_redbook_play to begin playing the track.

Next Topic (How do I loop a track off a CD?)

Previous Topic (How do I stream a file off a hard disk or CD?)


Group: FAQs and How Tos
Related Functions: AIL_redbook_open, AIL_redbook_play, AIL_redbook_track_info
